author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Former CIA Officer Charged With Conspiring to Commit Espionage for China
text:
A former CIA officer suspected of providing information to the Chinese government that helped it identify U.S. informants there was indicted on Tuesday and charged with conspiring to commit espionage.
Jerry Chun Shing Lee, who worked for the Central Intelligence Agency from 1994 to 2007, was arrested in January after arriving at a New York airport. At the time, he was charged only with unlawfully retaining classified information.
...
